## Source: khulnasoft-package-analysis (10dda22dfffad530173467dfb71a2ea25838bff9188097c7c7dd75d982defdbc)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'swift-login-api' @ 9.9.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
